resources.string:
We will make your day inspirational.



We are here to inspire your every single day with daily motivational quote, it can give you strength which you've lost it somewhere, it can help you to find your happiness which you've lost it somehow, it will tell you that get yourself up by your own.


 Features:- 

- Share the Quotes everywhere. 
- Night Mode. 
• ‎Hindi Quotes.


 Upcoming Updates:- 

• Customise notifications. 
• ‎Search quotes. 
• Set as favourite. 
• More languages coming soon.
